name: MyCase Evictions
description: go to https://public.courts.in.gov/mycase/#/vw/Search and search '02D03-2401-EV*' in case number. gather the information from each of the cases that come up in the results. After you click search and are taken to the search results, you will need to click on each individual result to gather the information for each result. When you open up one of the results, you will collect all the info on that page. This means you also need to expand all of the defendents and plaintiffs to collect the information under the drop downs.Then click the back button to go back to the search results. You will do this for every task on the page. scroll down to view the next task if you need to. once you have collected all the results on the page, you will need to go through to the next page. go through each page until all pages have been completed.
